description: Try our easy to follow DIY Barbeque Skewers With Tzatziki And Pita Dippers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: DIY Barbeque Skewers With Tzatziki And Pita Dippers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 12 bamboo skewers, soaked in water for one hour
260g lamb loin, cut into small cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue or grill pan on high heat and oven to 180Â°C.
To make the pita dippers, place pita on a baking tray and bake for 5 minutes or until crisp.
To make tzatziki, combine yoghurt, cucumber, garlic, parsley and lemon juice in a serving bowl. Refrigerate until ready to serve.

Place lamb, zucchini, mushroom, capsicum and tomato in dishes and allow diners to assemble their own skewers. Drizzle skewers with oil and grill on all sides for 4 minutes or until cooked to your liking.
Serve skewers with wholemeal pita dippers and tzatziki.
